verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
According to the hand,
Of the good Lord upon me,
We'll take the land.
An exceeding good land
If the Lord delight in us
Then He will bring us to this land
And give it to us
Only rebel not against the Lord
Neither fear ye the people of the land
They are bread for us
Their defence is departed from them
And the Lord is with us.
Fear them not.
